choices: Accidentaly bumble into a Team Rocket Base.
1.content: It was a special day for Aelius was going to meet up with Fortune his best friend today, Though unfortunately Aelius forgot where they were supposed to meet exactly. It had been Three months since Aelius last saw Fortune, He was not going to mess up their reunion. Running down the road he comes to a crossroads with many different paths leading off. He Decides off...
1.title: You are late

choices: They go to the nearest pokemon center
11.content:
Aelius was heading to the city to meet with his friend Fortune. "I hope I get to meet with Fortune soon. I hope I didn't mess this up"

Aelius then begins to look for his friend Fortune. As he begins to search for her. Aelius begins to notice a lot of stuff to do around town.

There were a lot of shops, tall buildings and lot of people that begins to crowd around. Aelius begins to have a hard time looking for Fortune.

"It's hard to see anything around here. I hope I can see Fortune" Suddenly he heard a voice. It was a female voice and it sounded like she was calling him.

"Aelius. Aelius over here" Aelius then looks and see's a women. He didn't know if it was Fortune, or not, but decided to go up to her.

Aelius get's to her and finds out it was Fortune. "Aelius there you are. I didn't think you would make it. I'm glad you came though" said Fortune.

"It was kind of hard to see you with all these people" said Aelius. "Well since your here and all. Let's go have some fun just you and me" said Fortune.

"I would like that Fortune" said Aelius
11.title: To the City.

12.content:
Aelius decided to go to the forest to meet with his friend Fortune. Aelius was now in the forest as he heads off to meet with his friend Fortune.

Along the way. Aelius has seen many forest pokemon along the way. He could see a Caterpie, Pidgy, Zigzagoon and many other pokemon.

"Wow there's seems to be a lot of pokemon here. I wish Fortune was here to see this" said Aelius. A few hours later, through the forest.

Aelius decided to take a break before continuing his journey. Aelius then let's out his Eevee and Fennekin as he realize it was getting late.

"It's getting late. I better set up camp for tonight" Aelius then begins to gather up some wood with the help of his two pokemon Eevee and Fennekin.

After a while. Aelius makes a campfire and begins to sit by the fire. Fennekin was the one who provide fire for Aelius using flamethrower.

After a while Aelius put's out the fire and falls asleep with Eevee and Fennekin. Aelius had heard about a trainer being lost, in the forest, and was never found.

Aelius hopes it doesn't happen to him. As they continue to sleep. Fennekin heard a noise and wakes Aelius up. "Ken Fennekin"

Aelius then wakes up. "What's wrong Fennekin?" He then heard the noise and so did Eevee. It was coming out of the bushes.

Aelius prepares for the worst. Who was it in the bushes?
12.title: To the Forest

choices: she accidentally annoyed a legendary while exploring some nearby ruins.
She is being hunted by one of the teams, and they shot something into her.
Strange things have been occuring since she bought a trinket.
125.content:
Fortune stumbles out from the bushes looking disheveled, her hair is a mess and she seems somewhat frantic. As she recognizes her friend her eyes go wide and a small smile appears on her face.
"Aelius? Is that really you? Oh great legendaries its wonderful to see you again." She says rushing over while checking around him. She then tries to calm herself and fixes her hair slightly.
Being Curious Aelius responds "Fortune, what happened to you? You so restless Instead of your normally calm self."
With a sigh she sits down and explains.
125.title: His friend Fortune

choices: Fortune feels strange and starts to change
1251.content: "I kind of accidentally annoyed a legendary while exploring some ruins" said Fortune. "A legendary pokemon? Do you know what the legendary pokemon is?" Aelius ask. "I can't quite remember. But I think it might be after me. But I do remember a strange energy going through me after I met the legendary pokemon" said Fortune. "Well I'm just glad your here now Fortune" said Aelius. "Me too Aelius" said Fortune. "Why don't we go find this legendary pokemon then and try to capture it" said Aelius. "I don't know Aelius. It sounds dangerous and that legendary pokemon almost hurt me and I'm tried" said Fortune. "Why don't you stay here then and rest. I'll go find this legendary pokemon" Fortune nods as she rest at Aelius's camp while Aelius went to find the legendary pokemon that Fortune found
1251.title: she accidentally annoyed a legendary while expl...

13.content:
Fortune always did like technology and science, Aelius reasoned that she might be there. At the Research Center He asks the receptionist if they had seen Fortune.

"Hmmm.... I think someone like that came in but I for get which department she went to go see. You can go look for your self."

"Fine." Aelius says with minor annoyance, the Research Center was Very large. To start looking Aelius found a map of the complex and picked from one of the major locations.

"I'll go to..."
13.title: To a Scientific Research Center

info.brief_description: Its a pokemon transformation story, currently being expanded.
info.description:
This is my entry into the pokemon Transformation stories started by biffea and continued by several others.

Rules:
No ending any line of chapters... only I can do that.
Additions need to be coherent...
No normal animal transformations, and if mythical tf's are present make sure to get creative with splicing pokemon into them, ie mermaid is now half magikarp instead of just half fish.
More rules can be added later on depending on what happens.
No normal Swearing, if you must swear get creative with it as standard swears bore me.
At present any kind of transformation (tf, tg, ar, ap, wg, inanimate, etc.) are accepted as long as any tf must adhere to the rule of no normal animals. (humans are an exception to this)

If you have an Idea but don't want to write it let me know and I might just write it giving the person credit for the idea.
Also choice chapters can be merged together without notice.

Main characters

         Aelius: Age 13 Relatively new Trainer Carrying two Pokemon: an Eevee, and a Fennekin. He is traveling the Region trying to figure out what he wants to do... while taking the Gym Challenge. Has brown Hair and blue eyes and Skin as pale as a ghost. (TG name is Aelia)

         Fortune: Age 13 A Very Experienced Trainer Currently Carrying Three Pokemon: A Serperior, A Lopunny, and a Kirlia. She is well known in the Pokemon community as an accomplished battler that likes to interfere with the likes of Team Rocket, or Team Plasma. She is best friends with Aelius and is currently meeting up with him. She bright red hair, with bright green eyes, With a fair complexion. (TG name is Felix)

It is Suggested that you make the two of them meet up... though it isn't required as of yet.
